page.title: 20The Community of Newborough
page.content: The majority of people living here were not born in the area; they live with parents or came here to work or to retire. Farming and timber felling are obvious occupations but there is a wide spectrum of other professions. Almost everyone living in this area enjoys being here; they like the peace and quiet of the pleasant village, the unspoilt countryside and the decent, interesting people of the small, friendly community where almost every- one knows everyone else. There are however some disadvantages: Some would like more public transport, more sports facilities & entertainment for the younger end. There are too few small, cheap houses and too much heavy and fast traffic through the narrow lanes.It would also be pleasant to have our own resident policeman and dispensing chemist.
